email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they are willing to come down to $51.25 per ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $51.25 per ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Can you confirm the vessel's availability and send over the charter party for review? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the vessel is confirmed for the laycan 15-20 October. I'll send over the charter party draft shortly. Please review and let me know if there are any amendments needed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, received the charter party. Everything looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John
